title: shankara guruvara
sahitya:
(rAgA:  dhanyAsi)   


anupallavi



shankara guruvara.  rAgamAlikA.  Adi tALA.
1:  shankara guruvara mahaimA suta rAmatitarati vAngmanasa  sImAm 
guru caraNa bhakti garimA mukharaya titarAm hi mUkakalpam mAm
 caraNam 2  			(rAgA:  behAg)Aa:S G3 M1 P N3 D2 N3 S  Av:  S N3 D2 P M1 G3 R2 S  kalyANam kalayatu naha kalyam kaivalya vallarI kandam 
kalyANa guNa guNADyam kancana karmandira ratnam-akhilEDyam
 caraNam 3  			(rAgA:  kEdAra)Aa:S M1 G3 M1 P N3 S  Av:  S N3 P M1 G3 R2 S  shrI candramauli caraNAmbhOja dvaya-yambharAyita svAntan 
bhaya bhakti bharita bhAvO bhagavatpAdAn vibhAvayE hrdayE
 caraNam 4  			(rAgA:  mOhana)Aa:S R2 G3 P D2 S  Av:  S D2 P G3 R2 S  tatvamasi bOdhanacaNE tattAddrng-mOha timira kharakiraNE 
bhaktajana bharaNa dhuryE saktam cittam mamAstu guruvaryE
 caraNam 5  			(rAgA:  khamAs)Aa:S M1 G3 M1 P D2 N2 S  Av:  S N2 D2 P M1 G3 R2 S  alpIkrta kalpatarum vitaraNa vibhavEna vishvaviditEna 
vismaya nIyodantam vishvagurum tam vibhAvayAmyantaha
 caraNam 6  			(rAgA:  tODi)Aa:S R1 G2 M1 P D1 N2 S  Av:  S N2 D1 P M1 G2 R1 S  shrngagiri divya nagara sthApita manavadhya shAradA pITham 
sampUjayantam anagham samsEvE samyamIndram anavaratam
 caraNam 7  			(rAgA:  shahAnA)Aa:S R2 G3 M1 P M1 D2 N2 S  Av:  S N2 S D2 N2 D2 P M1 G3 M1 R2 G3 R2 S  aSTAnga yOga niSTam shiSTAbhISTa pradam yati shrESTam
naSTAkhila viSaya spruha niSTAvAptyai namAmi sASTAngam
 caraNam 8  			(rAgA:  kalyANi)Aa:S R2 G3 M2 P D2 N3 S  Av:  S N3 D2 P M2 G3 R2 S  sarvAbhIpsita vitaraNa nipuNAnnamatAma-shOka lOkAnAm 
durvAdi garva carvaNacaNa dhiSaNAmstAn-namAmi gurucaraNAm
  caraNam 9  			(rAgA:  bhairavi)Aa:S R2 G2 M1 P D2 N2 S  Av:  S N2 D1 P M1 G2 R2 S  bhasitOddhaLita gAtram bhakta janAbhISTa vitaraNa vyagram 
bhava bandha mOkSa nipuNam bhavana gurum tam vrajAmyaham sharaNam
 caraNam 10  			(rAgA:  shankarAbharaNa)Aa:S R2 G3 M1 P D2 N3 S  Av:  S N3 D2 P M1 G3 R2 S  shankara bhagavatpAda sthApita mata SaTkapAlana pravaNam 
sharaNam mama hi jagadgur-vabhina nava narasimha bhAratI caraNam
 caraNam 11  			(rAgA:  suraTi)Aa:S R2 M1 P N2 S  Av:  S N2 D2 P M1 G3 P M1 R2 S  navaratna mAlikEyam racitA bhaktEna vaidyanAthEna 
(navaratna mlikEyam gItA bhaktEna vAsudEvEna) 
shankara guru guNa maNibihis- sakalairdhAryA hi sarvadA kaNThE
